entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Address param-nullchecking formatting issues #58950
    Backlog
  • Code style analyzers package doesn't load global config files on Linux #58948
  • Improve docs for testing source generators #58945
  • Cleanup treatment of Razor documents in IDE diagnostic service #58943
  • Roslyn crashes when compiling with NoStdLib flag #58942
  • Peek Definition tries to show the generated .razor.g.cs file #58939
    Backlog
  • A new VS 2022 ColorScheme #58937

Closed

  • API Proposal: Make RenameDocumentAction sealed instead of abstract #55539
    17.1
  • Use a cached delegate for method group conversion #5835
    Backlog
  • Run integration tests against unreleased builds of VS #57609

PullRequests

Created

  • ensure globalconfig files are lowercase #58957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Exclude two failing test from OptProf profiling #58956
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle AdditiveSpans in either order #58955
    Area-IDE
  • Fix CompilerDiagnostic not being Equal to itself. #58954
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Add test for nullable value type #58953
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow null checking discard parameters #58952
    Area-Compilers
  • Assert compiler diagnostics in param-null checking test #58951
    Area-IDE, Community
  • AsyncIterator: clear Current upon exit #58949
    Area-Compilers
  • Retry opening LightBulb when the session is canceled #58947
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58941
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Export VSTypeScriptFormattingService using a factory instead of directly #58940
    Area-IDE
  • Add formatting analyzer test for param nullchecking #58936
    Area-Analyzers, Test
  • Enable using cached results of the transform function for a SyntaxProvider when the SyntaxNode entry is cached. #58935
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main #58934
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Fix public API parameter (`warningLevel`) documentation #58946
    Area-Analyzers, Community, Next
  • Update API suggestion template #58098
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Allow 'ref' and 'in' parameters to be null-checked #58938
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Handle null coalescing assign-to-self scenarios #58933
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert 58892 #58930
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • Add tests for issues fixed by previous PR #58764
    Area-Compilers
  • Use interpolated string handler for Contract.ThrowIf methods #58173
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Port CSharpCodeActions and CSharpFindReferences to the new test harness #58037
    Area-IDE
  • Compiler warning CS8600 message: say possibly null-valued expression #58860
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Merge pull request #57132 from CyrusNajmabadi/branchId3" #58856
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Remove unnecessary lock access setting UIContexts in the workspace #58828
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Allow nameof to access instance members. #48754
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Allow native integer operators in the corresponding underlying types #53417
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [draft] IDE response to raw string literals #58846
    Area-IDE
  • Theme some dialogs #55971
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • List patterns: Slice value is assumed to be never null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • don't include implicit/explicit keywords when completing explicit interface operator #53938
    Area-IDE, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Update new UI after design meeting #58047
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58584
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce the memory usage of InheritanceMarginTarget #58175
    Area-IDE
  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Improve `CSharpSyntaxFacts.IsValidIdentifier` performance #55510
    Area-IDE, Community, Area-Performance
  • Enable CA1822 in Visual Studio layer #50569
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Community, Needs UX Triage
  • Enable CA2009: Do not call ToImmutableCollection on an ImmutableCollection value #53141
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Resolves issue #53426, translations missing #56885
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Don't remove cast when converting method group to object #58920
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support params Span<T> #57078
    Area-Compilers
  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • draft #58910
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • CA2208 Instantiate argument exceptions correctly #58768
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove unneeded project references in EditorFeatures layer #51471
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Revert "Revert "Update System.Text.Json to 6.0.0 (#58365)"" #58888
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [EnC] Store entire spans instead of line deltas #58831
    Area-Interactive
